entry.title: $2600 // $2600, 1BR in beautiful Clinton Hill
entry.content:
I am looking for a reliable sub-leasee from February 1, 2019 through August 30, 2020. You may be able to rent (or even buy) the apartment after that date.

Rent for the 1-BR apartment is $2,600/month, and you would be responsible for the electricity and Wi-Fi expenses, too. You would not be responsible for the gas or water expenses.

The apartment is located on the 10th floor of a beautifully manicured co-op campus in the Clinton Hill neighborhood of Brooklyn, NY. The unit boasts a beautiful 180-degree skyline view, modern appliances, and essential furnishings (king-sized bed, multiple wardrobes, leather couch, bookshelves, and smart A/C units). All of the neighbors on the floor are super sweet, generous, and respectful of one another's privacy and comfort.

The building is monitored 24/7 by camera surveillance and an ample staff of patrol guards. Enjoy building entry by wireless intercom and key fob, and elevator access makes the building ADA-compliant and wheelchair accessible. Shared commercial laundry facilities are available in the basement. Pets are welcome, too!!

Situated within a queer-friendly and kid-friendly neighborhood marked by bustling retail, restaurants, parks, schools, the Barclay's Arena, cultural, and transportation outlets, you can do just about anything within a 1-mile radius. You can also commute to Manhattan or Queens inside of 15 minutes.

All applicants must be interviewed by the co-op board and pay related application fees.

Please reply if you are serious about renting the apartment for at least 9 months, and would like to move forward with scheduling a viewing.
